\begin{eqnarray}
sA_{\mu }^{a} &=&-D_{\mu }^{ab}c^{b}  \nonumber \\
sc^{a} &=&\frac{g}{2}f^{abc}c^{b}c^{c}  \nonumber \\
s\overline{c}^{a} &=&b^{a}  \nonumber \\
sb^{a} &=&-Jc^{a}  \nonumber \\
sJ &=&0  \nonumber \\
s\eta ^{\mu } &=&\partial ^{\mu }J  \nonumber \\
s\tau ^{\mu } &=&\eta ^{\mu }  \label{s}
